title: Italian Sausage Soup with Tortellini
ingredients: ['500g Italian sausages, casings removed', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1.2L beef stock', '125ml water', '125ml red wine', '4 large tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped', '2 carrots, thinly sliced', 'handful fresh basil leaves', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '250g passata', '185g sliced courgette', '250g fresh tortellini pasta', 'handful chopped fresh parsley']
